arrive.content: You arrive at baba yaga house.

introduce.content: bla bla i baba yaga. do this

righthand.content: you done good. tomorrow you gotta tidy yard. clean hut and tidy pots.

failtask.content: You have chosen the wrong choice and failed the task. Baba Yaga is hungry and is not impressed by your failure.

tidyyard.content: It's time to clean the yard. How do you do it?

sortseeds.content: You gotta sort out the seeds.

doneseeds.content: baba yaga impressed. wow! you gotta make pea soup and fill up this bucket of water using this sift.

makepeasoup.content: you gotta make pea soup and sort out all of these peas. OOF!

sortedpeas.content: you sort out peas but now water

bucketfilled.content: you filled the bucket. baba yaga impressed. count stars. you cant. doll tells you

foundstars.content: you find the stars. wow! you win
